questiontext.text: Which two events below are independent of each other?

answer.text: Suppose event X is blood type AB in the United States and Y is blood type AB in China.

feedback.text: Suppose event X is the blood type AB in the United States and Y is the blood type AB in China…: Correct

answer.text: Event A is the age of any person and B is whether or not that person has successfully completed college.

feedback.text: Event A is the age of a random person and B is whether or not that person has successfully completed college: Incorrect

answer.text: Take a shuffled deck of cards and draw a clover card as Event A and then draw another clover card as Event B.

feedback.text: Take a shuffled deck of cards and draw a clover card as event A and then draw another clover card as event B.: Incorrect
A = {all numbers from 0 to 1}; B = {0}…: Incorrect
